mapper.select: Select exam_inf.exam_id,exam_inf.exam_name,exam_inf.start_time,exam_inf.end_time,exam_inf.reg_end_time,exam_inf.exam_state,project_inf.project_name,user_inf.user_name FROM exam_inf JOIN paper_inf ON paper_inf.paper_id=exam_inf.paper_id JOIN project_inf ON project_inf.project_id=paper_inf.project_id JOIN user_inf ON exam_inf.user_id=user_inf.user_id AND exam_inf.exam_id=#{examId} ;
